description.ko: 유기적이고 생물 발광을 하는 존재의 고동치는 호흡에 집중하여, 생명의 리듬에 대한 심해의 명상을 담아냈습니다.
description.en: A deep-sea meditation on the rhythm of life, focusing on the pulsating breath of an organic, bioluminescent entity.

prompt: An ultra-macro cinematic masterpiece of AURA-7, depicting a spiraling, nautilus-like organ made of translucent #7FB069 emerald moss and #2D5A3D vascular membranes. The entity is suspended in a silent, pitch-black liquid void, rhythmically pulsating as it inhales #E6F2E1 bioluminescent spores that glow like microscopic stars. Golden #FFE66D liquid sap flows through internal capillary networks, creating a warm, living glow beneath the skin. 8k resolution, rendered in Octane with hyper-realistic fluid dynamics, volumetric light shafts, and extreme soft focus bokeh.
